member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ApplicationBuilderExtension.UseStaticFilesWithCache(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Enables static files serving with the default cache expiration of 1 year.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ApplicationBuilderExtension.UseStaticFilesWithCache(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.StaticFiles.FileExtensionContentTypeProvider)
member.summary: Enables static files with custom content type provider, serving with the default cache expiration of 1 year.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.ApplicationBuilderExtension.UseStaticFilesWithCache(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.TimeSpan,Microsoft.AspNetCore.StaticFiles.FileExtensionContentTypeProvider)
member.summary: Enables static files serving with the specified expiration.
